评论详情: Love! Oversized so size down but love this shirt
I will buy this in all colors! Fits well for that oversized look. Perfect lightweight sweatshirt. *not long enough to cover the booty with leggings
One of my favorite sweatshirts for the season. I get compliments every time I wear it.
This is an awesome FP dupe. I wear it at least once a week. Looks great with leggings. I would have one in every color!

This sweatshirt is very oversized just like the original. Nicely made, comfortable, washes well (no shrinkage or pills). Not very thick material, but comfortable. Would definitely size down one or two sizes.
Top was way too baggy and unattractive. When I went to return, I’m getting $10 less than what I paid. Very disappointed
It’s perfect paired with jeans!
Style and fit are perfect. I want this in every color!

I purchased this to wear while helping with my grandbaby.  So for that it was perfect.  It’s a cute shirt and comfortable. I was in the northwest so the shirt wasn’t as warm as I hoped. This is a thin French terry. It pills easily after a few washes. I’m 5 ft 130 pounds and ordered a medium. I kind of swam in it. But for running around with a baby it was fine- just wore a cami under it for extra warmth.
Cute!

Cute and comfy style style. And I don't know about the other colors, but this brown color came out of the wash with what looks like water stains. Nothing else in the wash looked like this and no color ran. This was the first time it was washed and it was not dirty at all, but I had traveled in it.
Love this top!  Super comfy but not too heavy. Great to layer under an oversized jean jacket with leggings!  People are always asking where I got it.
I loved this sweatshirt so much that I went back and bought three more in different colors!

This purchase was for my daughter for Christmas,  however I had to return because I ordered the wrong size.  The color is very pretty and it's so soft.  I did reorder in the correct size, and she's very happy with it.

评论概述: Make sure you know it is a rough finish
评论详情: I like the shirt and wear it often but I didn't know it was a rough finish.  I didn't zoom in enough on the photo.  For quite a while I couldn't figure out which way was supposed to be the right side.  For a while I thought it was put together incorrectly as some seams are finished seams and some are the finish that is usually inside the shirt.  I finally figured it out after going back to zoom into the photo.  I wouldn't have purchased it had I known this but I am not really disappointed now.  I wear it often but I am not sure what people think when they see me in it.  Some have to think I have it on inside out.  LOL
I ordered a large due to everyone saying it was oversized, it's not, and the material is horrible,
I love this top.  It's a perfect weight, keeping me warm, but not too warm.  It pairs well with leggings and jeans.  The quality is top notch!

This is my all time favorite shirt. I have in two colors and will probably order more. I love it with leggings or skinny jeans, but it's so comfy. It's not too thin or too thick, just right! I'm 5'4" and it covers my bum just right!
Love this sweatshirt.  The color and fit are perfect.  It's a great oversized look.  I'm 5'5", 215lbs and ordered a large.

DO NOT BUY! If I could give this zero stars I would. Washed it per the instruction and it bled blue onto my entire load of laundry and ruined an entire load of clothes. Disgusting that this company is selling these with this default.
Very comfortable!

评论概述: Great quality, scrumptious  color like raspberry sherbet
评论详情: This is a beautiful shade. Well made, good quality. Runs roomy. Be aware  that it has an inside out look, not my favorite.

Look closely at the photo before ordering.  This is a knit top, not the usual sweatshirt fabric.  Half of the seams are sewn on the outside and half on the inside.  Maybe it's s style feature, but I didn't like it at all.  I couldn't tell if it was inside out or not.
This seems to run a little narrow. Although the fabric is soft I am keeping it but it didn't make me as comfortable as I thought. We did the measurement and it was not as depicted on the description
Super cute over sized top. Very comfy and great to wear with jeans.
I absolutely love this shirt !! It is definitely one of my favorites!

The quality is great and it is thicker than I expected which I love. The color is exactly as described and it has held up very well! I sized up to make it oversized but honestly it wasn’t necessary, my regular size would have been oversized
I am so pleased with this sweatshirt that I am ordering another. Love the design, the material and value.
Soft and good length
Super cute item. Debated on whether or not I would keep it. However, it came with no tags and smelled like it had recently been washed. Returned it.
Comfortable and as described

评论概述: Size runs really big, I would go a size down
评论详情: Cute sweatshirt to pair with leggings.
I love finding cute clothes on Amazon. Really pleased with this.
Love it
Purchased because looked like a a popular brand. The material was cheap looking and shiny
I ordered the blue and got a large. Size up for a more oversized fit. I love the longer back and the flair sleeves. It is so comfortable too ! Great purchase.

I love this sweatshirt! I bought it in black and loved it so much that I recently ordered one in brown. Even though it's already a little oversized, I ordered a large. I'm 5'5 and 130lbs. I wash it in cold water and hang to dry. The color doesn't fade. It's a very comfortable and super cute sweatshirt. I'll probably order a third color!
Cute oversized fits tts Very upscale vibe
Oversized and so comfy!! Great  thick material. Would definitely purchase again in other colors!!
My wife loves this shirt

I love this sweatshirt and have ordered it in 2 other colors. The color is bright and the fabric is very nice. Feels good and looks great. The added details of the split hem and split cuffs are super cute! Great value. Fit is true to size.
I love the shirt. The colors are exactly as pictured. However, the bottom part of the shirt is not as flowy as shown. Regardless still a nice shirt.
This blouse is super cute. The fabric and buttons are nice and the color does not run in the wash. I belted it to give some definition and since I’m only 5’1” it still covered lower tummy and rear.

评论概述: Looked like the dog ate it.
评论详情: Color was horrible and the shirt looked like my dog ate it. It went back.

I am a plus size girl and seen that most reviews said it was oversized, this sweatshirt in the plus sizes is not oversized at all. A 3xl is loose on me in a sweatshirt or a long sleeve tshirt and this fit like a tight fitted shirt. I do not recommend this for plus size women unless your like a small 1x. It’s not long and it cut very narrow in the hips and waist. The style is cute and it’s a weird heavy material- almost like a brushed terry, super bummed that it’s not plus sized, or oversized in the highest size,  Would not purchase again and am retuning,

评论概述: Compliments every time I wear it!
评论详情: Great quality for the price. Cozy. Washes well. Ordering another one in a different color.
I receive compliments every time I wear this shirt. It’s soft, the perfect weight and length and the color is great.

I have this top in apricot and in black. The apricot is pale, a contemporary blush as shown. The fabric is lighter in weight than I expected with the word "sweatshirt" in the title. The fabric is not a fleece, but akin to a smooth French terry. 2XL measures 59 inches at the bust, 55 inches at the hip.  I like an oversized look, and often size up for that. This top will be  great with leggings, but given the lighter-weight fabric and its drape, I might have done better to size down to XL here.
Light and soft I love it

I bought it because I thought it was cute and liked the worn in look style. It is NOT however a sweatshirt. It’s a shirt. Maybe a little thicker than a t-shirt. I’m not returning it because I don’t want to deal with the hassle. In my opinion it isn’t worth the money  It’s a $15 shirt at best.

Love this top (got the black)  and will be getting it in more colors! Wore it to work with faux leather leggings and leather booties and got so many compliments.  Oversized, relaxed fit and can be dressed up or down!
Didn’t like how it fit, quality was ok but pricey I thought for the quality once it arrived, I sent it back
Bought for my daughter and it just didn’t fit but beautiful
I love this top!!!
It was a very dark burnt orange colour, which I didn’t like. I have it in 3 other colours, which I love. Very big (L), but that’s what I wanted
I wanted something comfortable to wear on a travel day. Comfortable on the airplane but still cut and not homely looking.
I love this. So stylish, soft & cozy.
Comfy oversized fit, cute details!

I got a small, i’m 5’2 and 120 lbs for reference. It covers my bottom at least but I wish I got a medium. I ordered the color white, it looked more soft white in the picture and it’s stark, blinding white. So thin, and cheap material for my “splurge” of an almost $40 shirt. I’ll still wear it but I was expecting better.
Material is bery soft and seems to be of good value but it is oversized. Size down when ordering this
Did not like seams on outside of garment. They look like the material would unravel easily. Don’t like quality of garment.

Very oversized which is exactly what I wanted. I normally wear a M but I bought a L to wear around the house and it is perfect. I have not washed it yet, so I'm hoping it doesn't shrink or lose it's softness.
At first I thought it was made wrong but it’s cool , funky style is fun. The material is so soft , I will enjoy wearing it.
Sweatshirt was delivered with stains and no tags. Probably used then returned.

YOU CANNOT TELL IF THIS SHIRT IS INSIDE OUT OR WHAT....THE BUTTONS ON THE FRONT PLACKET ARE INSIDE THE SHIRT....THE SEAMS ON THE TOP OF THE SHOULDES ARE OUTSIDE .IT IS TOTALLY SEWED WRONG IN MY OPINION.....UGLY !!!!!!!
Very nice fit and comfy
Quality is wonderful, it’s held up well to washing, and it’s perfect for wearing with leggings for a cute, comfy weekend outfit!
It’s an oversized fit which I love! It’s super comfortable and it looks so cozy and stylish! Loved it!
Love the color and fabric, really comfortable!
I love this oversized, inside out look sweatshirt. It is so comfortable for around the house or out running errands
I love this. I ordered several colors. One of my favorites
Didn't look like what I ordered. Material was horrible.
I absolutely love this sweatshirt! Size is True to size, very comfortable and you can dress it up or down! I bought 4 different colors! Definitely a must have for yourself or to give as a gift!
Love the oversized fit and the color. Perfect to wear with  legging!

评论概述: Love the top just unsure of the seller. I got the LG and it was perfect!
评论详情: Love the top so much that I ordered a 2nd one but I have not received the 2nd one instead they sent me Gerber baby food apparently the SKU was the same! I sent the baby food back and still no top or refund! I did just order 2 more in different colors praying that I receive them! Would still love to have the chocolate color but afraid that it will get mixed up again that was the one that I was supposed to get. Love the top! Just not sure on the seller

评论概述: My Sweatshirt Tapered In at the Bottom
评论详情: I was really excited to find this sweatshirt. Unfortunately, as other people have mentioned, the bottom tapers in like a man’s sweatshirt on the one I received. The item photo, as well as some customer photos, show more of a straight or a-line cut at the bottom. Sending it back.

I absolutely am impressed with this casual good looking shirt. Love the vibrant color and I'm actually shocked at how thick and comfortable the material is on my skin. Looks fantastic on me. Super nice to have on a nice cool fall day like today and will be wonderful come winter time. Very well made and the stitching is very well intact and looks to be able to handle many washes in the next couple of years. I can't say enough nice things about this pull over shirt. I will most definitely be purchasing all the other colors.
Loved this sweatshirt for running errands on the weekend. I bought it a bit oversized so it’ll be slouchy and comfy. Love it

评论概述: I wish you would mention that the shirt kind of looks like it's inside out all the time
评论详情: I didn't like that the shirt looks like it's inside out all the time it seems that's kind of weird when I wear it I'm sure I'm going to get comments to that fact
This fits nothing like the picture and is definitely not “oversized”. Very Disappointed.
Love this sweatshirt!!! So comfortable and versatile! Wear with jeans or leggings to go out or lounge around! Great material and isn't clingy!

评论用户: Item did not work out. Wish I would of realized I couldn’t return for free 🤦🏽‍♀️
评论详情: Back was sewn backwards and still shipped out 😞
Item is a expected and advertised.  It's very soft.  I would order again.

This shirt runs huge. I probably could have sized down 2 sizes and it would've been perfect. I bought these when it was hot, and didn't try them on. When it finally cooled off enough to wear them, I discovered just how big they were.
I like oversized for fall and winter.  These run a lil big so possibly do not Size up.  However I love the material and color
A style reminiscent of the future look in Back To The Future movie.  Quite a bit ugly up close but I kept the two I bought because of comfort level.  I wouldn't wear them outside of home though.

Bad joke of a shirt; ugliest shirt I’ve bought in 70 years. It’s made of two different materials. The sleeves were sewn on INSIDE OUT. And the seams were sewn on all uneven and bunched up.  Annoyed that this wasted my time returning this.  AND NO TAGS ON IT. And it was Gianormous on me…
Love this sweatshirt- giving free people vibes - fit and quality nice , length perfect - going to grab in more colors!

Really like this shirt.  Covers enough that I'm comfortable wearing it with leggings.  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it really shrunk in the dryer.  I'm going to have to hang to dry.
Bought this sweatshirt last year and bought a new one this year.  The material and overall quality is much different and not for the better.  It is very thin and the seams are really off.
My shirt came as a more bright orange than the picture. I’ll wear it but was disappointed in the color.
I bought my size and it isn't close to being oversized. Why is it hard to find loose fitting comfortable clothes in larger sizes?

评论概述: Cute but looks like it’s inside out
评论详情: The shirt is very warm and cozy. But everyone always tells me I have my shirt inside out. I’m keeping it just to wear around the house. It’s very cute but kinda strange.

Just okay.  It is a pretty blue color but not soft and cozy for a sweatshirt.  I purchased using an influencer discount code.  It is worth the price I paid but I would never pay the original price listed.
I love the material very confortable and stylish.
I get compliments on this every time I wear it!!

This sweatshirt is sized perfectly and is a great color.  I would probably not buy another because parts are sewn with the fabric inside out, on purpose, just not really my style.  But it is good quality.
It’s just the right size and not too heavy for a cool day. I bought two of them.
Very well made. Free people vibes all the way. Definitely a staple style piece. Comfortable to layer under.
Loose in the upper body even with my large chest but tight in the hip area. Returned due to the odd fit.
